content:
Hello all,

I am wrapping up edits to the open-access book (#general > Modern Financial Modeling Book ) I've been working on and would appreciate (amongst any other comments!) someone to take a look at this small Distributed code example. I can usually get it to work after a couple of attempts, but it never renders when I use the QuartoNotebookRunner engine and sometimes hangs when I use the Jupyter kernel to render the chapter. This makes me think that I have not correctly implemented the code example? Would someone mind taking a look at a the example beginning using Distributed in this section and tell me if I have any correctness issues?

https://modernfinancialmodeling.com/parallelization#sec-multi-device
